issue.title: Repeat failed tests to identify flaky ones?

content.raw: That's a good point, but I think it could still be useful for `ci-pr_any`, since flaky tests are a problem there too. It would only repeat the failing tests, which are hopefully a small subset, so it may not add too much to the run-time, especially if we say `N=1`. We could see how much additional time it takes when we actually test it.
